publisher=[Printed by:] Williamstown, Massachusetts: McClelland Press; [Published by:] The [[Mythopoeic Society]] and [[The Tolkien Society]]

column1: '''''Tolkien Centenary Conference 1992''''' is a souvenir book which was published in conjunction to the [[J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]. It was limited to five hundred fifty copies.
The booklet features cover and title page art by [[Patrick H. Wynne]] and leaf ornament drawn by [[Tony Curtis]].

column2: Margrethe II]]; from an interview conducted by Thorkild Hansen in 1979)
